video.title: Mountain Men
video.synopsis: From the Great North Woods of Maine to the Alaska North Slope, a group of men live off the land and experience survival in its simplest form.

episodes.synopsis: As winter prepares to descend, self-reliant mountain men Tom, Eustace and Marty each try to lay in final provisions for the coming months.
episodes.title: Winter is Coming

episodes.synopsis: Tom helps a neighbor out with some pesky beavers, Eustace's land faces imminent seizure by the feds and Marty's trap line comes up almost empty.
episodes.title: Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Marty faces mounting transportation troubles, Eustace clashes with one of his workers and Tom struggles to get in enough meat for the winter.
episodes.title: Lost

episodes.synopsis: Eustace battles a nasty cold with a home remedy, Marty leaves his trap line to see his daughter's dance recital and Tom tangles with a mountain lion.
episodes.title: Miles From Home

episodes.synopsis: Tom renews his hunt for meat, Eustace hires a former helper to lend a hand and Marty races to get his furs in before the trapping season's end.
episodes.title: Surviving Winter

episodes.synopsis: Marty makes a mistake that could ruin his trapping season, Eustace faces water problems and Tom takes on wolves stalking his homestead.
episodes.title: Show Me The Money

episodes.synopsis: Eustace stalks poachers shooting game on his property, Tom is taken by surprise in the woods and Marty hunts caribou in grizzly country.
episodes.title: The Final Stand

episodes.synopsis: Tom rushes to finish his goods for market, Marty renews his quest for food and Eustace devises a desperate plan to save his land from repossession.
episodes.title: This Is The End

episodes.synopsis: Tom's home is threatened as fires rage in Montana's Yaak Valley. Marty flies into a dangerous storm on his way to Alaska.
episodes.title: Into the Wild

episodes.synopsis: In Alaska, warm weather interferes with Marty's plans. Eustace tries to track down the predator responsible for beheading two of his chickens.
episodes.title: The Night's Watch

episodes.synopsis: After losing food to a grizzly bear, Tom goes on a desperate hunt for deer. Marty gets his trapline up and running in Alaska.
episodes.title: Winter Strikes

episodes.synopsis: Tom tries to prepare the spoils of his deer hunt before the grizzlies get to it. Marty experiences more mechanical problems in Alaska.
episodes.title: Last Chance

episodes.synopsis: Rich and his dogs face off against an old enemy: the deadly mountain lion Three Toes. Marty gets a much-needed new engine for his snowmobile.
episodes.title: Three Toes Returns

episodes.synopsis: A mistake puts Charlie in jeopardy in the North Maine Woods. In Alaska, Marty goes missing after splitting up with Andy.
episodes.title: Bloody Sunday

episodes.synopsis: Tom's grandson gets a rude awakening when he comes for a visit. In Ruby Valley, Rich and his dogs get caught up in a dangerous mountain lion hunt.
episodes.title: No Way Out

episodes.synopsis: Rich continues his cougar hunt in Montana, Marty faces competition for food, and Tom and Will try to outrun a dangerous storm.
episodes.title: Disaster Strikes

episodes.synopsis: Charlie is injured and alone in the woods. Tom spots evidence of a predator near his home, and Eustace has to make a payment on his loan.
episodes.title: End of the Line

episodes.synopsis: Tom tries to drive a dangerous wolf pack off his property. Rich's hunt takes him over rough terrain, and George must trek through the Tetons on foot.
episodes.title: Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: Marty builds a second cabin with Andy's assistance, but the subzero temperatures make work difficult. Tim and Nancy try to help an injured Tom.
episodes.title: Going for Broke

episodes.synopsis: In Maine, Charlie goes back to work after his injury. Tom travels to Idaho to help his brother, and George is still struggling to find food.
episodes.title: Ticking Clock

episodes.synopsis: Eustace and Preston fend off coyotes. Charlie tries to get back in the game after recovering from an injury, and Marty struggles to get out of Alaska.
episodes.title: Settling the Score

episodes.synopsis: Marty has trouble with his snow machine, Rich and his dogs set out on a special mission, and Tom helps a friend deal with beavers.
episodes.title: Judgment Day

episodes.synopsis: With winter nearly over in Montana, Tom and Nancy rush to get through the rest of their work, but news from their family may change their plans.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: In North Carolina, Eustace braves a dangerous river to deliver a canoe. Charlie hopes to cash in on his furs, and Marty reunites with his family.
episodes.title: Misty Mountain
